bibl.title: The Strasbourg Papyrus of Empedocles: Some Preliminary Remarks.
bibl.note: Paper given at a meeting of Het Interuniversitair Onderzoeksinstituut Zeno of the Universities of Utrecht and Leiden, Leiden, June 9th, 1999. - À propos de: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999).
VAN DER BEN Nick, The Strasbourg Papyrus of Empedocles: Some Preliminary Remarks.
